content_descriptors.notes:
All characters in this game are adults aged 18 or over and all scenes and encounters are entirely consensual. Sexual and nude content is present in both the “Daily Life” and “Demon Hunter” gameplay. Sexual content includes vaginal, oral and anal sex, and non-penetrative intercourse with humans and monster girls, as well as nude scenes without sexual intercourse as an element. The game's “Demon Hunter” card battle combat features cards with explicit nude and sexual content, including depictions of bondage.

Mature themes in the story include mental illness, social anxiety and abandonment. Frequent profanity is present in the script, as well as sexually explicit dialogue. Violence is present in the script and dangerous combat is described accurately.

legal_notice: Futariuum's Gate © 2023-2024 Gloomy Washer. All rights reserved.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Steam OS or Ubuntu 16.04
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 750 (AMD equiv.) or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: OpenGL 2 and/or DirectX 9

Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6 or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 750 (AMD equiv.) or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: OpenGL 2 and/or DirectX 9
